description: Goat's beard is an amazing plant! It has lush, impressively two-toned foliage with finely serrated leaves that offer a unique texture - and its plume-like flowers add more visual interest as they emerge as creamy white sprays in late spring/early summer. This plant is easy to care for and is both deer and rabbit resistant. It thrives in woodland or rock gardens and can grow in semi-shade, making it a great addition to any garden. Not to mention, its wonderful delicate hue contributes to the landscape in an unexpected and refreshing way. With all its amazing features, this special plant will truly stand out and make a memorable impression!
